duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement and coordinate the operational aspects of ongoing Channel Sales activities.
Provide customer support and liaison between Channel Sales leadership and distributors.
Manage projects, review status of projects and budgets, and coordinate schedules.
Facilitate team alignment and develop mechanisms for monitoring Channel Sales progress.
Deliver status reports and assess project issues to meet productivity and quality goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
